about_the_game:
Manufactured from 1976 until 1991 at the "MEVA" factory in Romania, these Eastern-European freight cars were and still are used for transport of palletised goods, such as bottled water, cooking oil, beer, soda, etc. They are 14,02m in length (or 14,52m for the version with brake platform), sit on 1-axle bogeys, have a top speed of 100km/h and were exported to other countries also, such as Greece and possibly Germany.


Pack includes:

24 freight cars with photorealistic textures
1 ex-freight car converted to generator car
full PBR textures
3 different kinds of train-end signs
brakeshoe option (does not affect the braking sequence, only for visual effect)
dedicated products
animated couplers & air hoses and sounds
3 levels of buffer contact sounds
Up to 6 levels of LOD
Doors & shutters that open/close via Properties tab or when loading/unloading plus sounds
disable Physics option
custom bogeysounds
custom full braking sequence sounds(best use in Cab mode, can be disabled via Properties tab)
engine sound for the generator car with on/off option
custom Industry object with 3 levels of LOD and nightmode. (named 'TM - Deposit 1')

Manufactured from 1976 until 1991 at the "MEVA" factory in Romania, these Eastern-European freight cars were and still are used for transport of palletised goods, such as bottled water, cooking oil, beer, soda, etc. They are 14,02m in length (or 14,52m for the version with brake platform), sit on 1-axle bogeys, have a top speed of 100km/h and were exported to other countries also, such as Greece and possibly Germany.


Pack includes:

24 freight cars with photorealistic textures

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: A pack of 24 high detail Eastern-European freight wagons with custom loads, custom sounds, and a custom industry object.
supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
